H0.text: who is the most losing team in nfl history. Chicago Bears

H1.text: who is the most losing team in nfl history. Detroit Lions

H2.text: who is the most losing team in nfl history. Cleveland Browns

H3.text: who is the most losing team in nfl history. Arizona Cardinals

A4.text: the Cleveland Browns have had only four winning seasons since 1999 and a 17-season playoff drought until 2020

A5.text: the Cleveland Browns were the second team in NFL history to have a 0-16 season in 2017, following the Detroit Lions' 0-16 season in 2008

A6.text: the Cardinals have recorded the most losses by a franchise in NFL history with 822 regular season losses as of 2024
